description: Computational model for predicting skin barrier states based on microbiome and biophysical markers.

biophysical_markers.name: Surface pH
biophysical_markers.impact: High pH increases protease activity and S. aureus adhesion.

biophysical_markers.name: Lipid Peroxidation (SQOOH)
biophysical_markers.description: Squalene monohydroperoxide level indicating oxidative stress.

microbial_markers.name: Alpha Diversity (Shannon Index)
microbial_markers.description: Higher diversity correlates with barrier resilience.

microbial_markers.name: C. acnes Phylotype Ratio (IA1 vs II/III)
microbial_markers.description: Predominance of Phylotype IA1 correlates with inflammatory acne.

interventions.mechanism: Selective fermentation to increase antimicrobial peptide production.
Barrier reinforcement via tight junction upregulation.
